channel.title: What is left in a 317?
channel.description:
What is left in a 317(377) protocol.
Almost everything has been done to transfer things to a 317.
Everything in the 317 that is out is all over used, and are all the [b]EXACT[/b] same servers.
The only thing i can think of is adding newer maps.
Discuss.

item.title: What is left in a 317?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:13, topic:339769”]In order for the server to communicate with the client it HAS to be using the jagex protocol. Good luck rewriting that.[/quote]???

how is that in the least bit difficult?

Read full topic

item.title: What is left in a 317?
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

317’s are beast, ~400 you have the loss of mapdata, the gameframe, messed up interfaces, overpowered items, summoning.

317’s can be easily customized, modifies, and personalized, other clients cannot. the 317 client is the version that is the most renamed.

The most popular sources are 317, as well as the most stable.

In my opinion 317’s are not dying, but to attract players you need originality,
Originally it was items, then animations. All thats left is music and maps. go figure.

Read full topic

item.title: What is left in a 317?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:16, topic:339769”][quote author=Frell link=topic=436145.msg3204066#msg3204066 date=1273615982]
In order for the server to communicate with the client it HAS to be using the jagex protocol. Good luck rewriting that.
[/quote]

What? Who said anything about rewriting the 317 protocol to connect with a higher revision?
Thats retarded.[/quote]
You said change login method, logging in uses the protocol.

Read full topic

item.title: What is left in a 317?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Frell:

In order for the server to communicate with the client it HAS to be using the jagex protocol. Good luck rewriting that.

What? Who said anything about rewriting the 317 protocol to connect with a higher revision?
Thats retarded.

I’m planning to use the 455 i have and start a base from scratch.

[quote=“badger41, post:14, topic:339769”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=436145.msg3204059#msg3204059 date=1273615608]
@Your statement It would be pointless.
[/quote]

pointless in what way?

it would indeed be great to anti alias the graphics a bit better.

but i guess frell has a point anyway.[/quote]

First of all, what person with the knowledge to do this would take hours of their time to do this?

Second of all, its easier just to use a 317 how it was intended for, instead of hardcoding/packing every thing into it.

Jagex made 400s better for a reason.

Read full topic

item.title: What is left in a 317?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

All I was trying to point out, is that it would bring it back in style. Nobody would need to learn the new packets, except for custom ones you installed yourself.

the elve age:

Everything in the 317 that is out is all over used, and are all the EXACT same servers.

Is what i was getting at in the above post.

Read full topic

item.title: What is left in a 317?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:10, topic:339769”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=436145.msg3203953#msg3203953 date=1273610715]
What is left in a 317(377) protocol.

Almost everything has been done to transfer things to a 317.

Everything in the 317 that is out is all over used, and are all the EXACT same servers.

The only thing i can think of is adding newer maps.

Discuss.
[/quote]

Why not change around the login-method, and such. Less for Jagex to sue for? Another suggestion, to make 317’s the cool thing again. Pack all 474 items like I did, and add the new animation header, to get all of the 474 graphics/emotes as well. From there, start adding custom packets for custom things, like Cocoa had a custom packet for music around on certain area’s.

Creating completely new things on a 317 could bring them back in style, just nobody takes the time to do it, since they can download, what i call, a “plug-n-play” server.[/quote]

This is why 317s are ruined. 400s are SO much better then any 300 revision.

All these 317-474 look a likes are just stupid. Most don’t have the 474 in to play, wow you have dfs animation! But it doesn’t work how its suppose to.

The way 400 loads everything (on demand, instead on loadup) [quote=“badger41, post:8, topic:339769”]this may sound stupid.

but why not try to make the rendering in the 317 better?[/quote]

Why try to do it when we can just use a 400+ revision and have full construction and hunter. Instead of trying to copy it.

@Your statement It would be pointless.

Read full topic

item.title: What is left in a 317?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:1, topic:339769”]What is left in a 317(377) protocol.

Almost everything has been done to transfer things to a 317.

Everything in the 317 that is out is all over used, and are all the EXACT same servers.

The only thing i can think of is adding newer maps.

Discuss.[/quote]

Why not change around the login-method, and such. Less for Jagex to sue for? Another suggestion, to make 317’s the cool thing again. Pack all 474 items like I did, and add the new animation header, to get all of the 474 graphics/emotes as well. From there, start adding custom packets for custom things, like Cocoa had a custom packet for music around on certain area’s.

Creating completely new things on a 317 could bring them back in style, just nobody takes the time to do it, since they can download, what i call, a “plug-n-play” server.

Read full topic
